name: Hypermarket 3D
description:
Become the top Hypermarket Cashier Superstar in this game of attention and efficiency. Drag the items coming your way to the weigh machine and/or scanner accordingly, then drop'em to the shopping cart to rack crazy dough till the end of your shift.

-Simple, easy one-touch controls
-Even more items you can find than in a real supermarket
-Tons of colorful, juicy stages
-Fun gameplay rewarding efficiency
